page.title: 11HOLTON AREA FARMING
page.content: The range is from small holdings providing partial income through to units in excess of 1000 acres having several employees who may or may not be resident on the farm. Field size ranges from small paddocks of 2-3 acres to large arable fields over 100 acres. The land is mostly clay 15-30 metres above sea level. Arable crops predominate on the total farm area. Wheat occupies 50%, barley 20%, sugar beet 8%, oil seed rape 8%, grass 13%. The remaining 1% comprises peas, potatoes, oats, beans,turnips & soft fruit. The only livestock of significance in the area are sheep. There are no longer any commercial dairy or pig herds. Chickens are not kept on a large scale but some turkeys are reared for the Christmas market.
